data.title: LANGUAGES
data.text: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, SQL, XML

data.title: TOOLKITS
data.text: Gulp, Webpack, Vite, Parcel, ESLint, StyleLint

data.title: PLATFORMS

data.text: Figma, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe InDesign

data.title: Web Developer, Co-Founder
text: • Write, modify and test website related code • Determine hardware and software requirements to achieve optimal server performance • Conduct tests and perform security and quality controls  • Develop website architecture • Design, develop and implement information systems business solutions  • Operate automatic or other testing equipment to ensure product quality

data.title: Web Designer
text: • Maintain existing computer programs by making modifications as required • Source, select and organize information for inclusion and design the appearance, layout and flow of the Website • Prepare reports, manuals and other documentation on the status, operation and maintenance of software • Prepare mock-ups and storyboards

data.title: Head of Designers
text: • Create and optimize content the Website using a variety of graphics, database, animation and other software • Research and evaluate a variety of interactive media software products • Conduct reviews to assess quality assurance practices, software products and information systems

data.title: Graphic Designer
text: • Communicate technical problems, processes and solutions  • Assist in the collection and documentation of user's requirements • Assist in the development of logical and physical specifications

data.title: Web Designer, Founder
text: • Lead and co-ordinate multidisciplinary teams to develop Website graphics, content, capacity and interactivity • Design and integrate website related code   • Consult with clients to develop and document Website requirements

data.title: Baltic State Technical University
text: Software engineering, Master’s degree in Information Systems and Technology

data.text: 4 years of experience in web development. Expert knowledge working with HTML5, CSS3, JS and TS. Experience with React, Redux, Express. Familiar with NPM, Docker, Node.JS, SQL. Technical and documentational skills enable the development of clarify and structable code. Understanding of SSR and Automation testing. Years of experience in computer Design. Great attention to detail and being highly organized. Experienced with the Agile/Scrum development model. Using version control like Git. Effective as both an independent and team worker. Ability to handle multiple tasks under tight deadlines. Strong hybrid working communication skills
